problem_text_cn: 如图,长方体的长为5,宽为3,高为12,点B离点C的距离为2,一只蚂蚁如果要沿着长方体的表面从点A爬到点B,需要爬行的最短距离是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the length of the cuboid is N_0, the width is N_1, and the height is N_2. The distance between point B and point C is N_3. If an ant wants to climb along the surface of the cuboid from point A to point B, the shortest distance it needs to crawl is ()
raw_answer: 解:将长方体展开,连接A、B,根据两点之间线段最短,BD=2+3=5,AD=12,由勾股定理得:AB=√{AD^{2}+BD^{2}}=13．故选:B．
